snippet.title: Glorious Morning
snippet.description:
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/track/2XpXDMRJiYLygz1rFQF6rc
Bandcamp: https://waterflame.bandcamp.com/album/community-favorites
Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/91476

There are also FOUR other variations of Glorious Morning!
- Glorious Morning 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yolbGaJD4AY&list=PLsKWgfWtIc5oBxZAYuP5CXJl9_qG3Awn7&index=8
- Glorious Morning (Castlestorm Edition): http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL5xceeTDjuOPHBIQnD4TdpNljEggDFfsv
- Glorious Morning (Age of War 2 Edition): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6KFIxSHxr64&list=PLsKWgfWtIc5oBxZAYuP5CXJl9_qG3Awn7&index=1
- Glorious Thunderzone: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vkqdk6dDbHA

For more game music of this style, check out my Techno-Orchestral music playlist here!
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLsKWgfWtIc5oBxZAYuP5CXJl9_qG3Awn7

--------------------------------

Made in 2007!

This music has a long history of development. it started out as a small victory fanfare for a game called mecha pumble, but i liked the clip so much after finishing it that I decided to try to make something more of it. the original song is about twice in length,  but pulled out / just has more of the same. later when the contest for castlecrashers songs came up, I cleaned it up into a loop and submitted it, I figured it would go well for something of an intro. I placed 4th, if i recall correctly.
later this music was used as the theme song in a few flash games, like for instance, age of war, siegius, miragine war, etc.
Now a final remake is in production, but until then, enjoy this, almost classic tune by now ;)

Most my music is royalty-free as background music depending on use, read here:  
http://www.waterflame.com/contact-info

Join my official mailing list for latest news and updates!
https://groups.google.com/a/waterflame.com/g/list/about

Also follow me on Twitter and Discord!

https://discord.gg/aBbbeDrsKQ
